trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGWILBLACKBRASH_00042_ELURED_000_1<tab>I'm a busy man, so state your business or leave me to mine.
TEXT_REGWILBLACKBRASH_00042_SCENE00000A2<tab>What is the purpose of the station?
TEXT_REGWILBLACKBRASH_00042_ELURED_000_10<tab>I oversee all operations here at Black Brush Station. Have been doing so since it was constructed.
TEXT_REGWILBLACKBRASH_00042_ELURED_000_11<tab>Shipments of ore arrive daily, and we have to unload and sort it all for the furnaces.
TEXT_REGWILBLACKBRASH_00042_ELURED_000_12<tab>Takes a strong back and sure hands. I should know─used to be a smelter myself, until the Calamity crippled my arm and put an end to that.
TEXT_REGWILBLACKBRASH_00042_ELURED_000_20<tab>We extract metal from ore. Bronze, silver, mythril─you name it, we smelt it.
TEXT_REGWILBLACKBRASH_00042_ELURED_000_21<tab>See all that smoke? It comes from our furnaces. We keep them burning day and night with a steady supply of fire crystals.
TEXT_REGWILBLACKBRASH_00042_ELURED_000_22<tab>Aye, without me and my boys sweating it out here, the lords and ladies wouldn't be able to deck themselves out in fancy baubles.
